EmailTemplate.subject: Your application for the role of {!Job_Application__c.Role_to_assess_for__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for applying to be an Associate Mentor with The Challenge Network. We have had lots of applicants this year and unfortunately on this occasion you have not been successful. But, please don’t be disheartened – there are so many other opportunities with The Challenge Society that we would love you to get involved in! You can find out more information about these opportunities and others on The Challenge Society website: http://www.thechallengesociety.org/login.php?reason=1&continue=%2Findex.php%3F
Thanks again for your application and we look forward to seeing you at a Challenge Society event soon!
Best wishes,
The Challenge Society
